actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-533, by Ms. Foxx.
Resolution provides for consideration of H.R. 4901 and H.J. Res. 88.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 110.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 706.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 231 - 182 (Roll no. 173).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 183 (Roll no. 174).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4901) to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 88) disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to the definition of the term "Fiduciary"; and providing for proceedings during the period from May 2, 2016, through May 9, 2016.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4901) to reauthorize the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act, and for other purposes; providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 88) disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to the definition of the term "Fiduciary"; and providing for proceedings during the period from May 2, 2016, through May 9, 2016.
